answers.answer: Hi catereyes,One of the common causes for increased hunger is diabetes. So you test your blood sugar level.The other possibilty is that your appetite would have been suppressed all these days becuase of some illness and once you have recovered from that illness your appetite would have become normal.Regarding the tummy becoming bigger, the description given by you is not adequate.I would like to know whether it is getting distended or whether more fat is gettingdeposited.================================================================The information provided is for patients’ education only and is not a medical advice. Always consult your personal physician for complete evaluation of your health problem.- Ratnakar Kini M.D.================================================================

question: im taking a herbal vitamins before and i stopped it 4 almost 1 month and im just wondering.. why until now im always hungry and i always want to eat something? why it happened? and my tummy becomes bigger and im not a pregnant? why? how come?
title: why i loss my appetite?
